channel.title: nsaunders.dev
channel.description: Nick Saunders' technical blog and profile

item.title: From CSS madness to CSS Hooks
item.description: The limited capabilities of inline styles have frustrated web developers for decades, forcing us to choose between unmaintainable architecture and complex workarounds. CSS Variables offer a solution.

item.title: Function asChild
item.description: The pitfalls of polymorphic components, and how I use a time-tested React design pattern to overcome them
